description:
_________________________________________________________________________

✓ Updated as of November 2015
✓ Free Access to my course on How to create professional Website in a Day.
✓ Teacher with over 3,000 Happy Students
✓ 100% Student questions solved. Also via skype.
_________________________________________________________________________

Students, just need a computer, and an internet connection to get started.

No specific software required, nor additional materials. No need for big effort or patience. Very straight forward and suitable for any mindset!

100% Beginner-Friendly.

No matter where you are located, what your nationality or age is, you will get a vast knowledge and entire description on the process of how to create a personal email address. It's 2015. Let's face it. No matter if you have a car shop or a multi million dollar cake-shop business, you need a professional email address that doesn't finish in @google or @yahoo - There is no other way that people are going to take you serious.

In this course, I commit to teaching you how to:

  1. How to study this course.
  2. How to create your Zoho Account.
  3. How to find out how you want your domain to look like
  4. Purchase it via WIX (if not already purchased)
  5. Link your mail services to WIX
  6. Create your email accounts
  7. Test-send your first email (you're set up from there)

The terminology utilized in this course is easy to understand for non-native english speakers, for the purpose of making the learning of this course possible for anyone who has a basic english level. There is no necessary previous experience for taking this course. You will learn absolutely everything necessary in this course, and you will earn a huge knowledge on how to create your very own and high-end email address. As your teacher, I commit, to solving any doubt wherever it might appear. Please use this service at all times! It should take a couple of days, on an average, to effectively complete the course, since it's structured on easy-to-follow lectures put in a chronological order for the ease of learning. Make the most out of your free time. It will be a very easy beginning, and those who show enthusiasm and are constant on the course instructions, will feel very well compensated.

Ready for a change?
Get yourself a personalized email address!

Best,
Gonzalo
title: Create a Professional Email Address in 10min [CUSTOM & FREE]
